items.sentence: I\'m glad you were able to go to Boston with Tom.
I ran into Tom this afternoon in the supermarket.
I remember meeting Tom at a conference in Boston.
I can\'t stand people who yell at their children.
I closed the door so that they wouldn\'t hear us.
Tom won\'t spend New Year\'s Eve with his family.
It\'s more fun to play baseball than to watch it.
Tom couldn\'t keep up with the rest of the class.
Tom couldn\'t make Mary understand what he meant.
Tom doesn\'t need to come if he doesn\'t want to.
